REPLICATES.description: Links derivative instruments to their underlying assets

HEDGES.description: Connects derivatives to specific risk types
examples: Interest rate swap hedges duration risk

CORRELATES_WITH.description: Links alternative investments to traditional asset classes
examples: Hedge funds correlate with equity markets

CONSTRAINS.description: Connects investment constraints to investment strategies
examples: Liquidity needs constrain private equity allocation

REQUIRES.description: Links investment objectives to necessary allocation approaches

VIOLATES.description: Connects specific actions to ethical standard violations

COMPLIES_WITH.description: Links performance presentation to GIPS standards
examples: Composite construction complies with GIPS methodology
Performance calculation complies with time-weighted standards

IMPACTS.description: Connects economic indicators to asset class performance

INFLUENCES.description: Links monetary policy to interest rates and economic variables

AFFECTS.description: Connects inflation to bond valuation and purchasing power
examples: Inflation affects fixed coupon bond values

MITIGATES.description: Links risk management techniques to specific risk types

MEASURES.description: Connects risk metrics to portfolio risk dimensions

DIVERSIFIES.description: Links asset combinations to portfolio risk reduction
examples: International equities diversify domestic market risk

PREREQUISITE_FOR.description: Connects foundational concepts to advanced topics
examples: Time value of money is prerequisite for DCF valuation
Probability concepts are prerequisite for options pricing

BUILDS_ON.description: Shows knowledge progression and conceptual hierarchy
examples: Multi-factor models build on single-factor models

FREQUENTLY_TESTED_WITH.description: Identifies common exam combinations of topics
examples: Ethics frequently tested with GIPS standards

CALCULATES.description: Links formulas to financial metrics they compute
examples: WACC formula calculates cost of capital
Sharpe ratio formula calculates risk-adjusted return

CONTRADICTS.description: Identifies opposing theories or inconsistent concepts
examples: Efficient market hypothesis contradicts technical analysis

REGULATES.description: Connects regulatory bodies to financial activities they oversee
